entry.title: Dynabrade 51860 - 1.0 Hp Trim Router (Complete) 20000 Rpm 1/4 Inch Collet Governor-Controlled Rear Exhaust
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Routers
Price: 1046.10

[shortdesc]
  • 1.0 hp Trim Router (Complete)
  • 20,000 RPM, 1/4 Inch Collet, Governor-Controlled, Rear Exhaust
  • Ideal for countless routing applications, on surfaces such as hardwoods and softwoods, cabinets, casework, doors, panels, counter-tops, displays and more!
  • 1.0 hp air motor is governor-controlled to maintain consistent speed under load
  • Lightweight thermal-insulated tool housing is ergonomically designed for operator comfort.
  • Each model includes 1/4 Inch collet, for accepting optional 1/4 Inch router bits
  • Safety-lock throttle lever prevents accidental tool start-up, for enhanced workplace safety.
  • Tool includes router nose assembly and 51861 template guide (with 1/2 Inch dia
  • base)
  • Nose assembly and template guide are nickel-plated for added durability.
  • Allows quick adjustment of trim housing depth
  • Two wrenches included.
    • [/shortdesc]

entry.title: Dynabrade 51330 - .7 Hp Router 20000 Rpm Front Exhaust 3/8 Inch-24 Spindle Thread
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Routers
Price: 708.35

[shortdesc]
  • .7 hp Router
  • 20,000 RPM, Front Exhaust, 3/8 Inch-24 Spindle Thread
  • Ideal for chamfers and roundover cuts on hardwoods, softwoods, solid surfaces or plastics
  • Great for laminate trimming, surface planing, beveling and cornering.
  • Tool accepts optional high-speed steel router bits with 1/4 Inch diameter shank capacity
  • Also accepts optional 1/8 Inch collet insert, for mounting 1/8 Inch diameter router bits.
  • Lightweight, non-marring composite fixed base allows for a 90 degrees cut
  • Base offers easy height adjustment.
  • Safety-lock lever is standard
  • Front exhaust directs chips away from cutter.
  • Spindle lock allows one-wrench cutter changing
  • Includes guide rails, ideal for use on glue seams.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Air Flow 26.0

    Free RPM 3200
